definition: to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct

sentences.english: This paper based on the boiler rebuild project of DaLian Maritime University.
sentences.chinese: 本課題來源於大連海事大學的鍋爐房改建工程。

sentences.english: The project is a conversion and extension of an existing building.
sentences.chinese: 該項目是既存建築物的改建及擴建。

sentences.english: Recently it was turned into a museum.
sentences.chinese: 最近，它被改建成了一家博物館。

sentences.english: They transformed the basement into a reading room.
sentences.chinese: 他們把地下室改建成閱覽室。

sentences.english: The alternative is when you dream about remodeling or reconstructing a space.
sentences.chinese: 相對的是你夢見改建或重建一個地方。

sentences.english: XuChan reasonable request the wealth DingGu reconstruction, haed with screen appear.
sentences.chinese: 合理徐嬋要求財旺把丁家改建時，有維帶著銀屏呈現。

sentences.english: The No. 8 Bridge project, Jiangguo Zhong Road, Shanghai, is a concret case of the reconstruction of a factory.
sentences.chinese: 上海建國中路八號橋項目是一個工廠改建的實案。

sentences.english: The remainder of this reclaimed land has been turned into residential subdivisions, which are among the finest in the city.
sentences.chinese: 剩下的土地被改建成市內最好的住宅區。

sentences.english: He turned a garage into a library.
sentences.chinese: 他把車庫改建成圖書館。

sentences.english: New technique is applied to reconstruct the diversion tunnel to the vortex flow tunnel with energy dissipation.
sentences.chinese: 應用新技術將導流洞改建成旋流消能泄洪洞。

sentences.english: Elizabeth II now has rebuilt that bridge.
sentences.chinese: 伊麗莎白二世現在已改建的橋樑。

sentences.english: The live in a converted barn.
sentences.chinese: 他們住在穀倉改建成的房屋。

sentences.english: They converted the spare bed-room into a study.
sentences.chinese: 他們把多出來的臥室改建爲書房。

sentences.english: We hereby apply China Classification Society to carry out the following classification and Statutory surveys to major conversion of the vessel.
sentences.chinese: 茲申請中國船級社執行下述之一的重大改建入級檢驗。

sentences.english: The plan of reconstruction has not taken on the shape yet.
They turned the reading room into a laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 他們把閱覽室改建成了一個試驗室。

definition: to extend (a building, an airport runway etc)
Xinjian county in Nanchang 南昌, Jiangxi
to repair/to refurbish/to renovate/to refit/to mend/to rebuild

to tear down/to demolish/to dismantle/to remove
